Unit.Name: F-15Z Space Eagle
Unit.Description: This air and space superiority fighter can operate in the air and in the space. It is designed to hunt another aircraft or spacecraft down.

Unit.Name: Sandworm
Unit.Description: This ferocious monster from a certain desert planet can devour surface creatures at astonishing rate.

Unit.Name: Yellow Submarine
Unit.Description: We all live in the yellow submarine!
